QxtWebRemoveCookieEvent Class Reference
[QxtWeb module]

Describes a cookie to be deleted from a web browser. More... 

 #include <QxtWebRemoveCookieEvent>

Inherits QxtWebEvent.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Attributes

  • QString name

Public Functions

  • QxtWebRemoveCookieEvent ( int sessionID , QString name )

Detailed Description

The QxtWebStoreCookieEvent class instructs the session manager to remove a cookie stored on the web browser.

Member Documentation

QString name

Contains the name of the cookie to be removed.




QxtWebRemoveCookieEvent ( int sessionID , QString name )

Constructs a QxtWebRemoveCookieEvent for the specified session that will removed the named cookie from the web browser.
